def_cn: (化学物质)起催化作用的，有催化性的
def_en: In chemistry, a catalytic substance or a substance with catalytic properties is a substance which increases the speed of a chemical reaction.

def_cn: 催化性的；促进性的；刺激性的
def_en: If you describe a person or thing as having a catalytic effect, you mean that they cause things to happen or they increase the speed at which things happen.
